About Us

At SRK Exports, we bring together a group of integrated companies to deliver end-to-end engineering and manufacturing solutions across pattern making, foundry operations, machining, and component sourcing.

Our Mission

To provide high-quality ferrous, non-ferrous, and engineered components through advanced foundry, sourcing, and machining solutions. We aim to create long-term value with integrity and innovation.

Our Vision

To be a globally recognized partner in casting and sourcing solutions, known for our innovation, sustainability, and excellence across industries.
